迂回路: (うかいろ) - detour; diversion; alternative route
迂廻: (うかい) - detour; to detour/to circumvent; turning movement
迂拙: (うせつ) - poor and careless way of living; self deprecating first person pronoun
迂濶: (うかつ) - careless; stupid; thoughtless; heedless; unobservant; inadvertant; incautious
迂生: (うせい) - self-deprecating first person pronoun used in letters
迂言: (うげん) - roundabout explanation; one's words/one's speaking
迂闊: (うかつ) - careless; stupid; thoughtless; heedless; unobservant; inadvertant; incautious
迂闊千万: (うかつせんばん) - (yoji) very careless; quite thoughtless
迄: (きつ) - Até, até (um momento), até, para, até; para (um lugar), até, até onde; para (uma extensão), até, até onde, mesmo; apenas, somente
迄に: (までに) - by; not later than; before
迄も: (までも) - (more emphatic than まで)  to (an extent)/up to/so far as/even; (usu. as 〜までもない) doesn't amount to doing .../not significant enough to require ...; (usu. as 〜ないまでも) even if ...
迅速: (jinsoku) - rápido, veloz, rápido, ágil, imediato, simplificado, acelerado, expedito
迅速果敢: (じんそくかかん) - (yoji) quick and decisive; fast and daring; swift and resolute
迅速果断: (じんそくかだん) - (yoji) quick and decisive; fast and daring
迎い酒: (むかいざけ) - morning drink to get rid of a hangover
迎えに来る: (むかえにくる) - to call for somebody; to come for someone; to pick someone up
迎えに行く: (むかえにいく) - to go to meet somebody
迎える: (mukaeru) - to go out to meet; to receive, to welcome, to greet, to salute, to hail, to reach, to approach, to enter (uma fase, era, etc.) , to go out to meet; to receive, to welcome, to greet, to salute, to hail, to reach, to approach, to enter (a phase, era, etc.); to accept (e.g. as a member of a group or family); to call for, to summon, to invite
迎え人: (むかえびと) - person who goes to greet someone (e.g. at the airport)
迎え入れる: (むかえいれる) - to show in; to usher in
迎え撃つ: (むかえうつ) - to ambush; to attack; to assault; to meet the enemy
迎え火: (むかえび) - (ant: 送り火) welcoming fire for returning spirits (on the first night of the Bon festival)
迎え酒: (むかえざけ) - hair of the dog; another drink in the morning
迎合: (げいごう) - ingratiation; going along with somebody's views; adjusting oneself (to something, to somebody); flattery
迎撃: (げいげき) - intercept; interception; counter attack
迎撃ミサイル: (げいげきミサイル) - interceptor missile
迎賓: (げいひん) - welcoming honored guests (esp. from overseas)

迎車: (げいしゃ) - taxi en route to a customer
近々: (きんきん) - soon; nearness; before long

近いじゃない: (ちかいじゃない) - It's close, isn't it?
近い将来: (ちかいしょうらい) - near future
近からず遠からず: (ちかからずとおからず) - neither near nor far
近く: (chikaku) - near, neighbourhood, neighborhood, vicinity; nearly (por exemplo, "levou quase um ano"), close to
近しき中に礼儀有り: (ちかしきなかにれいぎあり) - A hedge between keeps friendships
近ぢか: (ちかぢか) - soon; nearness; before long
近づきがたい: (ちかづきがたい) - unapproachable; inaccessible; difficult to access
近づきにくい: (ちかづきにくい) - unapproachable; inaccessible; difficult to access
近づく: (ちかづく) - to approach/to draw near/to get close; to get acquainted with/to get closer to/to get to know
近づける: (ちかづける) - to bring near; to put close; to let come near; to associate with

近付ける: (ちかづける) - to bring near; to put close; to let come near; to associate with
